metadata.title: CVE-2020-7929 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted query contain a type of regex. This issueaffects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.21 andMongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.20.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
